casebody.data:
Barry HIRSCHBERG and Elizabeth Hirschberg, Plaintiffs-Movants,
v.
FIDELITY NATIONAL TITLE INSURANCE COMPANY, The Estate of Sydney Stoldt and Goodman, Stoldt & Horan, Defendants,
and
Jensen & Marotta Associates, Inc., Dan Jensen and J & M Title Services, Inc., Defendants. M-643 September Term 2018
080963 Supreme Court of New Jersey. March 8, 2019

ORDER

It is ORDERED that the motion for reconsideration of the Court's order denying the petition for certification is denied.
